definition: All Saints' Day (Christian festival on 2nd November)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Every year, thousands of people visit cemeteries in Peru and elsewhere to honor their deceased loved ones.
sentences.chinese: 每年萬靈節，數以千計的人們都會前來掃墓。
